org.interpss.numeric.util
Class Number2String

java.lang.Object
  org.interpss.numeric.util.Number2String

public class Number2String
extends java.lang.Object

Num2Str class is for formated output. It is based on the DicimalFormat class.

                                     java.lang.String s)
Format a string to the specified length.

Parameters:
length - the length of the formatted string. white space will be patched at the begining if length > 0 or at the end if length < 0
s - string to be formatted
Returns:
formatted string
